DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis seafood protein give combination carbohydrate low GI superior seafood protein combination carbohydrates high GI meat combination carbohydrates low high GI promote energy expenditure satiety . The overall objective study investigate acute effect meal contain fish versus meat proteins energy balance ( thermogenesis , appetite regulate hormone appetite sensation ) , marker glucose allostatis amino acid metabolism .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects Different Protein Sources Different Glycemic Index Energy Balance , Glucose Allostasis Amino Acid Metabolism : Randomized , 4-condition , Two Cross-over Study Adults .
